-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Library and utility interfacing to longurl.org
--   
--   The library provides a Haskell binding to the longurl.org API. The
--   utility finds all URLs in its input that longurl says it can expand,
--   and then tries to expand each of them in-place.
@package hlongurl
@version 0.9.3


-- | License : See the file LICENSE
--   
--   Status : Coded
--   
--   Codec for de/encoding URI strings via percent encodings (cf. RFC
--   3986.)
module Util.Codec.Percent
getEncodedString :: String -> String
getDecodedString :: String -> String
getEncodedChar :: Char -> Maybe String
getDecodedChar :: String -> Maybe (Char, String)

module Network.LongURL
data CurlInstance
CurlInstance :: Curl -> String -> CurlInstance
curl :: CurlInstance -> Curl
userAgent :: CurlInstance -> String
longURL :: CurlInstance -> String -> IO URLInfo
data SupportedSite
SupportedSite :: String -> [String] -> SupportedSite
siteName :: SupportedSite -> String
domains :: SupportedSite -> [String]
supportedSites :: CurlInstance -> IO [SupportedSite]
data URLInfo
URLInfo :: String -> Maybe String -> URLInfo
longURL' :: URLInfo -> String
pageTitle :: URLInfo -> Maybe String
instance Show URLInfo
instance ShowSC [QueryParam]
instance ShowSC QueryParam
